name: Battle Monster but Less Is More
name_original: Battle Monster but Less Is More
description:
A simple games based on Less Is More. You tweak your stats to gain higher score to defeat enemies. The less stronger your monster is, the more score you get.

  • Tweak your stats to increase your multiplier to gain more score!
  • Beat your highscore by optimizing your stats!
  • Beat the enemy monster in as less turn as possible to gain more score!

Submit your screenshot of your highscore below!

This is an entry to Blackthornprod's Game Jam #3
